gui.config.baseTickRate: §fBase router tick rate (with no Speed Upgrades)
gui.config.senderParticles: §fShow particle effects when a Sender Module sends an item
gui.config.pullerParticles: §fShow particle effects when a Puller Module pulls an item
gui.config.placerParticles: §fShow particle effects when a Placer Module places a block
gui.config.breakerParticles: §fShow particle effects when a Breaker Module breaks a block
gui.config.vacuumParticles: §fShow particle effects when a Vacuum Module absorbs an item
gui.config.sender1BaseRange: §fBase Range for Sender Module Mk1 (no Range Upgrades)
gui.config.sender1MaxRange: §fHard Maximum Range for Sender Module Mk1 (with Range Upgrades)
gui.config.sender2BaseRange: §fBase Range for Sender Module Mk2 (no Range Upgrades)
gui.config.sender2MaxRange: §fHard Maximum Range for Sender Module Mk2 (with Range Upgrades)
gui.config.puller2BaseRange: §fBase Range for Puller Module Mk2 (no Range Upgrades)
gui.config.puller2MaxRange: §fHard Maximum Range for Puller Module Mk2 (with Range Upgrades)
gui.config.vacuumBaseRange: §fBase Range for Vacuum Module (no Range Upgrades)
gui.config.vacuumMaxRange: §fHard Maximum Range for Vacuum Module (with Range Upgrades)
gui.config.extruderBaseRange: §fBase Range for Extruder Module Mk1 (no Range Upgrades)
gui.config.extruderMaxRange: §fHard Maximum Range for Extruder Module Mk1 (with Range Upgrades)
gui.config.extruder2BaseRange: §fBase Range for Extruder Module Mk2 (no Range Upgrades)
gui.config.extruder2MaxRange: §fHard Maximum Range for Extruder Module Mk2 (with Range Upgrades)
gui.config.extruderSound: §fPlay sounds when an Extruder Module extends or withdraws
gui.config.extruderPushEntities: §fThe Extruder Mk1/2 modules can push entities along when extending
gui.config.flingerEffects: §fPlay sound and smoke effect when a Flinger Module flings an item
gui.config.ecoTimeout: §fIf a router in eco-mode is idle for this many server ticks, it will go into low-power mode
gui.config.lowPowerTickRate: §fAn eco-mode router in low-power mode will only tick every this many server ticks
gui.config.startWithGuide: §fNew players start with a copy of the guide book
gui.config.alwaysShowModuleSettings: §fShow module settings tooltips without needing to hold down Shift
gui.config.moduleGuiBackgroundTint: §fTint module GUI backgrounds with the same color as the module item
jei.recipe.module_reset.description: §fCompletely resets the module to its newly-crafted state.  Beware: ALL data, including filter settings and enchantments, will be lost (but any installed augments will be returned)
